programme.title: A Fishy Chase
programme.desc: Something is fishy in the air! Its Don’s new pet, a Goldfish. Charly Marly and Lary are drooling in hopes of feasting it, but not till Don is there to rescue it.

programme.title: Easter Bunny
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: Shapeshifter
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Bubble Cars
programme.desc: As Deedee and Nino were wondering what Charlie got the twins for their birthday, Sandy whizzes past in a brand new pedal car. Boris got one too, but he doesn’t want his to get dirty at all. So he decides not to use it at all even though he misses all the fun Sandy is having. Mewmew and Sandy even have a race across town. Boris even declines a chance to race, but is entirely sceptical about it as he doesn’t even want a splash of mud to fall on it. He is even more worried when he sees Sandy’s car not working. Deedee tries to help by magically trying to create a bubble guard around Boris’s car, but the spell falls on Sandy’s car instead. Now no one can even touch the car, let alone repair it. Boris vouches to allow Sandy use his car as he acknowledges that it was his undoing that led to the creation of the bubble in the first place. Sandy is overjoyed and promises to be extra careful. So careful that Mewmew can even beat her by running on his ears. Deedee tells Boris to prove to Sandy that she can use the car faster, so Boris races with Mewmew and accidentally splashes mud over his face, but then is happy he does and enjoys the fun. He races so fast that he pops the bubble guard over Sandy’s car by crashing into it. Charlie sets down to fix the cars and the twins are driving them in a jiffy, giggling all the way.

programme.title: SOMETHING STINKS
programme.desc: Negu has his henchmen pump a foul green fog up to the Yan World, forcing the Elders to evacuate the Westerly Breeze. Aboard the Lord of the Wind, Pai fails to impress the Elders and gets “Rocky Rodent” – a crisis of confidence. The Elders have to pump Pai’s confidence back up so he can help Xia and April defeat the Worm Monster sent by Negu.

programme.title: See The Problem
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: The Magic Wand
programme.desc: The van of the magician is passing by the GrandPAs house as Hoodie grabs the magicians wand unnoticed and heads towards the house.

programme.title: The Start of Me
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: HOT(H)ELL
programme.desc: Chai Raja has a wedding to attend and leaves the hotels charge in Sundars hands for the first time ever. Sundar wants to prove to his boss that he is truly capable. He is all geared up and tries everything possible to make tea in his boss style. It is tea rain all over the place with the customers cringing and getting burned. It is havoc in the teashop when Basha decides to add to Sundars agony. What follows is a mad chase. And when Chai Raja returns, what remains of his beloved eashop is just the door!!!

programme.title: CHOR POLICE
programme.desc: One fine morning, an evidently pea-brained police constable comes to hotel Kelifornia with a smart thief handcuffed to his hand. Basha is absolutely enjoying the funny difficulties the policeman faces while having food with the thief handcuffed to his hand; while Sundar is all respect for the policemen. Basha decides to up the fun by making the policemens life miserable; and Sundar is in running around protecting the policemen. But he causes more trouble than help. The mayhem reaches a crescendo when the smart thief gets to runs away when the handcuff breaks in the madness and in his place Sundar gets handcuffed to the policeman. And a fuming policeman whacks Sundar and runs behind the thief!Basha laughs innocently basking in his successful mischief!

programme.title: Swimming Class
programme.desc: Dunky wants to learn swimming so goes to the lake with a tyre tube with Keet who is helping looking at the swimming manual to tell him how to swim.

programme.title: Sing For Your Supper
programme.desc: Deedee is excited to prepare for Mayor De Pfeffle’s banquet the next night, so she is all ready for the much needed sleep and yawns away on her cosy bed. But she and all of Abra-Dabra is wide-awake because of Luciano’s late night opera rehearsal. The next day everyone is so sleepy eyed that they request Luciano as politely as ever possible that they could all sleep if Luciano didn’t sing at night. But Luciano is outraged and declares he will never sing ever again. Thinking that the problem is solved they all return to their homes to practice for the upcoming banquet. Deedee tries out a food invisibility spell on an apple, but ended making all the fruits on the table disappear. But the magic didn’t happen only in Deedee’s house, but all over Abra-Dabra in an alarming rate that Mayor De Pfeffle had to ask Deedee to find a way to reverse it. But when she turns back to her usual self and cannot find Nino, she sings out Nino’s name that make a cherry fruit pop up in a tree, and she is amazed to note that more singing brings the food back. So she rounds up all of Abra-Dabra to sing together to bring the food back. They are able to bring back some of the food, but not just enough for the banquet, so Deedee asks Mayor De Pfeffle to request Luciano to help them out. But Luciano is too puffed up in pride and indignation that he outrightly refuses. Mayor De Pfeffle has no other choice but to postpone the banquet. Discouraged and hungry, Deedee sings a little and gets a small morsel to give her hungry friends, but just then her plate is so full of food when Luciano sings out. He even comes to town-hall where he sings his best and all the food comes back. Overjoyed, Mayor De Pfeffle asks if Luciano would grace the banquet with his awesome talent. Luciano agrees to sing promising to all that he will never again disturb them at night.

programme.title: COWBUAAY CHAI
programme.desc: There is a harvest festival and Chai Raja expects extra business. Sundar is awed by the grand floats and dressed up cattle but what seems to be the star attraction is a cattle wrangler who dressed in fancy gear shows off his talent at lassoing. Sundar manages to cajole a lasso out of the performer but is pathetic he just ends up breaking stuff around the shop. An irate Chai Raja snatches the lasso and chucks it away warning Sundar to keep away from it. But the naughty Basha having overheard the exchange snatches up the discarded lasso. He tries a few flicks and thanks to his circus bent of character is able to master it. The thrilled Basha now sets about framing poor Sundar- he wrecks, snatches away fries and disrupts work about the shop with the lasso and Chai Raja believes its Sundar who does it. Sundar must now quickly rein the situation before he gets the proverbial boot.

programme.title: Rest-O-War
programme.desc: A cookbook open on his left, and tears in his eyes as Don chops onions. Colonel is the new restaurateur, and Don the head chef. All the food is being diverted into the trio tummies. Frustrated of waiting, would the customers ever be served?

programme.title: BABY DRAGON
programme.desc: Xia tries to master his transformation into the Dragon Warrior. Negu sends a Mutant Dragon, who decides Xia would be a perfect baby for her. April and Pai get the Mutant Dragon to fall in love with their dragon-shaped ship, the Lord of the Wind.

programme.title: Dragonfish Lake
programme.desc: The twins are out skateboarding and delivering newspapers to homes around Abra-Dabra, but Uncle Charlie warns them it can be dangerous as it might hit someone. But thinking of the possibility of the idea, Charlie tries a hand at throwing a newspaper onto Tiggy’s lawn, but ends up flying in through the window. On hearing a scream, Charlie rushes in apologising for hitting Tiggy, but it turned out that Tiggy was moaning for what he read in the newspaper. It was about a contest of the Chef Challenge Award featuring whether Tiggy’s rival, Chef Alfonse could win it. Tiggy always wanted to win the challenge but never knew what original recipe to make. Tiggy gets jealous as he reads Chef Alfonse’s fish-a-la mode recipe that he promises to create the dish himself and if turns out to be really good as the newspaper says it is, he will admit how good his rival really is. So Tiggy waits a long while at the lake to catch a fresh fish as the recipe calls for it. Soon all his friends come over to help him fish, each with their very own fish lines. Seems a little magical assistance can help this time. But the lake is now occupied by one big playful dragon fish. The dragon fish turns out to be really hungry, so Tiggy sets out to make the biggest beetroot and berry snack ever. The dragonfish gulps it all down happily, but Deedee is sad she couldn’t really help Tiggy with the recipe. Tiggy on the other hand is quite ecstatic that he was able to whip up the most original dish ever. So over pancakes the next day Tiggy discovers that he has been awarded the annual Chef Challenge Award for the most original beetroot and berry recipe based on the photo and information Deedee gave to the judges. Tiggy is delighted to see an appreciative comment by Chef Alfonse that Tiggy’s surprise-a-la dragonfish being totally top-notch.

programme.title: All Aboard
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: MeetZoonicornPromi
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Who Ate it?
programme.desc: There’s one last donut in the house – and 3 hungry donut lovers... each one of them determined that no one (other than them) gets it!

programme.title: A Book for a Book
programme.desc: Cat is sick of Keet winning all the time. He runs through the newspapers and sees an ad of a book ”10 ways to catch a parrot”.

programme.title: The Smighty Express
programme.desc: Creating Smighty Railroad, a secret way to the Smighty Stones, was a good idea, until the Villains found out. The Super Six must embark on a suspenseful and high-speed train race across all of Smightyland to stop Sneevil and Biggs in their locomotive from reaching the Stones first.

programme.title: CHAPPAR PHAD KE!
programme.desc: Customers are complaining about the taste of the tea. Chai raja cant concentrate in preparation as the Radio is going on and off due to weak signal. Chai Raja orders Sundar to climb the roof of the tea stall and hold the radio for better signal. This is the golden opportunity for Basha, with Sundar on the roof; there is no one to guard the tea. That is not it. Basha tries everything possible to make the radio signals go crazy thereby making Chai Raja go crazier and Sundar running for his dear life!

programme.title: Mini Fix
programme.desc: Colonel is building a HUGE MINIATURE city out of LEGO-like blocks. There are trees and roads and houses with windows and tall buildings and a hospital and a police station and prison and pools. Now what could go wrong here???

programme.title: Shivery Timbers
programme.desc: Mildred the ghost has had just about enough of the Creepy Candys noisy shenanigans and wants the library quiet.It is then the Creepy Candy find a secret treasure map and decide to follow it. The clues lead our daring swashbucklers on a high seas adventure of danger and mystery.Will they discover a hidden treasure? What will it begold, jewels, chocolate? Will Mildred ever be happy? Watch this exciting episode of Shivery Timbers and find out!

programme.title: NeverGiveUp
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: The Boy Who Cried Wolf
programme.desc: The shepherd boy is bored of uneventfully peaceful days. One day, he gets an idea for a prank - to lie about seeing a wolf to his village people.

programme.title: The Speed record
programme.desc: MewMew has a new stopwatch and wants to time everything that everyone does, to get to them to do it at record speed. Life in Abra-Dabra becomes intolerable as everyone tries to be quicker than the next person. Eventually Deedee and the others persuade MewMew to break all his speed records. When he achieves it no one applauds him, so MewMew realises that many things are better done in their own sweet time. He also realises that by doing everything fast, he is missing out on enjoying many things.

programme.title: Comet Run
programme.desc: X begins acting strangely, creating tension with Speed and the others. When X leaves to join the Shadowy Organization, Speed decides to infiltrate the Shadowy Org to save him. Speed soon discovers that X is working undercover. When Xs cover is blown, he and Speed must try and escape the Shadowy Organization HQ with the missing Part.

programme.title: Muffin Delight
programme.desc: GrandPA is out of town and Dunky is really up and grooming himself in the mirror and cleaning the house. He has made a special gajar ka halwa but quickly hides it from Keet and Cat.

programme.title: Wasteland
programme.desc: The twins clean a wasteland to make it a nicer playground to play in.

programme.title: Bobby's Day Out
programme.desc: The loose motion has caught on to Cat, when he agrees to babysit his neighboring cat Katreena’s neice for the afternoon.

programme.title: Pool Off
programme.desc: Ever seen sharks in a swimming pool? The Rat-a-tat swimming pool has many such surprises including grenades, sharks and weights! Watch Colonel twist and turn to woo a hottie.

programme.title: A Zoonicorn Followed Me Home
programme.desc: When Odessa can’t take a trip to visit her grandmother, a visit from the Zoonicorns inspires her to rediscover the wonderful things there are to do around her very own home. Appreciating that everyday things can be and are special.

programme.title: Tin Can
programme.desc: Tin Tin Tin, Hepi and Briko have an unbelievable idea for these tin cans

programme.title: The Heroes’ Path
programme.desc: Xia is bored because it’s been days since Negu sent a Mutant when he finds the instructions for the “Heroes’ Path”. Pai and April laugh at what they think is a silly game for kids, but Xia completes each step with great excitement. When one of the instructions is to steal the Glove of the North, Xia begins to suspect something. Thanks to his quick wits he manages to save the Glove of the North and find out who was behind the “Heroes’ Path” – a mutant fox, sent by Negu.

programme.title: Comet Run
programme.desc: X begins acting strangely, creating tension with Speed and the others. When X leaves to join the Shadowy Organization, Speed decides to infiltrate the Shadowy Org to save him. Speed soon discovers that X is working undercover. When Xs cover is blown, he and Speed must try and escape the Shadowy Organization HQ with the missing Part.

programme.title: Whoops Elujah
programme.desc: When Ene messes up building a playset, it turns out to be even more fun than the original, Pancake learns a lesson about “When the world gives you lemons....”. Mistakes are just unexpected surprises.

programme.title: The baby dromedary
programme.desc: The twins help a little pharaoh to find his lost pet, a baby dromedary.

programme.title: Plot for Teacher
programme.desc: Speed and his friends have succeeded in acquiring the missing part from the Shadow Organization, but upon trying to make it work with the Mach 6, they are thrust into an alternate reality where the Shadowy Organization is in charge. They must return the part to where they found it, in Shadowy Org HQ, in order to get back to the present. Now that theyve had a glimpse of the Shadowy org.s master plan, they know what they have to do to stop them.

programme.title: Office Fiasco
programme.desc: Don gets a new office job and he is so excited to begin. Are the rats equally excited?? well they are – but for something else. With their pranks and tricks, Larry Marly and Charly make sure that Don doesnt reach his office. But, when he somehow reaches the office, they make sure that the boss throws him out finally.

programme.title: Remote War
programme.desc: Don and the terrific trio are at war for the TV remote. It all comes down to a swallowed remote that changes channels with every hiccup. Now that is very convenient. The mice get ready in Scuba Gear to perform a close tummy surgery to save the remote. Will sentimental soap or Jolly Good cricket win the Toss?

programme.title: Music Mayhem
programme.desc: Whoever heard of Ipods short circuiting? To add to that rigged head phones, musical bombs and bombastic explosions that takes them to outer space. The brother duo gets mummified ultimately but still there is no end to this musical mayhem.

programme.title: The Zoo Trip
programme.desc: Chaos unfolds as Chottu Mottu Lambu Don and Colonel decide to make a trip to the zoo. Starting from feeding the animals, from sneaking into the control room and opening the enclosures and racing crocodiles, they mess it all.

programme.title: BirthDay Party
programme.desc: Its GrandPAs birthday and Keet and Cat are given the task of decorating the house while Dunky is planning to make a nice cake for the evening party.

programme.title: Baby Sitting
programme.desc: It’s the summer holidays. GrandPA’s daughter is visiting her dad from the neighboring town with her year old baby.

programme.title: Colour Chaos
programme.desc: Mayor De Pfeffel can’t decide what colour to paint the town hall as it is so dull and grey. So Deedee offers to help, without magic this time, by getting a town vote as to which colour is liked best. Deedee and Nino go ahead and do just that, asking each and everybody they see in Abra-Dabra and noting their choice of colours. Boris and Sandy are confused so set out to paint and decide, but end up messing up the wall. They seek the help of Deedee, who is all so ready to help. But Nino is scared things will get worse with the powerful magic spell, and with good reason. The spell not only “cleaned” Charlie’s wall but made grey stripes on the walls of every house in Abra-Dabra! Even Tiggy’s yellow house is all grey!! So Deedee and everybody else pitch in and paint every house back to its original colour. So the final building standing is the town hall, but no one has sufficient pain for any one colour. So they finally decide to paint it with every colour they have, like a rainbow!

programme.title: Laundry Business
programme.desc: It is laundry day for Don. And the rats are blocking his way from the first step itself. The whole place is a mess. But when Colonel comes in the picture, the war goes to the next level. Thanks to the rats, Don and Colonel now have nothing to wear.

programme.title: The Librarian
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. programme.title: Lets Get Kraken
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. programme.title: Car Trouble
programme.desc: Colonel buys a brand new car and brings it to show off to his bro Don. But Larry Marly and Charly would just not let it happen. The dog bros put their lives in danger to save the shiny four wheeler. But alas! All that is left of the car is its crumpled skeleton. Thank God the rats spared their lives!

programme.title: The Speed record
programme.desc: MewMew has a new stopwatch and wants to time everything that everyone does, to get to them to do it at record speed. Life in Abra-Dabra becomes intolerable as everyone tries to be quicker than the next person. Eventually Deedee and the others persuade MewMew to break all his speed records. When he achieves it no one applauds him, so MewMew realises that many things are better done in their own sweet time. He also realises that by doing everything fast, he is missing out on enjoying many things.

programme.title: Bored
programme.desc: Kala is bored, and Gummy and Harry’s attempts to snap her out of it wind up having unexpected results.

programme.title: Kitten up a Tree
programme.desc: When Gummy comes upon a kitten stuck up a tree, he and the gang become increasingly caught up in trying figure out ways to get it back down.

programme.title: Basket Bunny
programme.desc: Fred bargains with the girls basketball team to let Brains join the team. In return, he agrees to be team’s bunny mascot, commanding Friday into a pair of super-jumping shoes. His get up proves handy when Brains needs his help capturing a massive space chicken.

programme.title: Three's A Pain
programme.desc: When Pancake, Odessa, and Maple end up getting into a tiff over some colored chalk they’re using to draw pictures with, they ALL wind up in the Zooniverse at the same time that night! Sharing is caring. / Teamwork is the way.

programme.title: Science Unfair
programme.desc: Fred is not prepared to enter the school science fair, but at the last minute, he transforms Friday into a glove that dispenses soda from the fingers. He wins! Soon he learns though that the fair was an effort to find someone with small enough hands to blast into space and rescue the stranded Astronaut, and Brains’ hero, Caribou Caruthers.

programme.title: Merry Go Bush
programme.desc: Pancake isn’t taking care of his new pet fish appropriately, even though he’s trying super-hard. When he arrives in the Zoonivese and tries to help Ene take care of a Merry-Go-Bush, he learns to that there’s a right way, and a wrong way, to care for something (by following the rules), no matter the good intentions

programme.title: Wink of an Eye
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Hungabunga
programme.desc: Sneevils evil plant, the hunga bunga, grows out of control and captures the Smighties. Its up to Dude and his fish friends to stop it.

programme.title: The Repeating Ghost – Fearless John
programme.desc: The fairytale detective, SANDRA, and her assistant, the elf FO, go into the story of FEARLESS JOHN, having been called out by a PRINCESS. According to her, JOHN, who she was in love with, accepted the mission from her father the KING, to break the curse over the haunted castle by remaining inside it for three nights. The problem is that five days have now gone by and JOHN has still not come out of the castle. SANDRA and FO will go into the terrifying castle to find JOHN, and will have to overcome SPECTRUM, the powerful ghost that lives there.

programme.title: Cricket Match
programme.desc: Keet and Cat decides to play a game of cricket in the backyard with their own set of teams.

programme.title: Top Turtle
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Mister Perfect
programme.desc: Nora is so impressed with Eddie’s philanthropic music concert, Fred uses Friday to trick Eddie into letting him headline the show.

programme.title: Friday Gets Recalled
programme.desc: Brains is informed that Friday is being recalled, and replaced by a superior shape-shifting robot weapon. Fred convinces Brains to help retrieve Friday from a futuristic junk yard, because Friday is also a friend. Meanwhile the new robot tries to hunt them down and stop them.

programme.title: Scolymus – The Sorcerer’s Apprentice
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of the SORCERER’S APPRENTICE, having been called out by the old sorcerer and mentor in the story. When he returned from his journey, he found his tower full of water, as in the classic tale. But, unlike the story, his APPRENTICE had also mysteriously disappeared. SANDRA will discover that the APPRENTICE has been kidnapped by SCOLYMUS, a sinister spirit invoked by the apprentice to do his work for him.

programme.title: Bottle Racquet
programme.desc: Fred and friends don’t have a place to play “Laser Ball.” An eccentric environmentalist inspires Fred to build his own island out of discarded plastic water bottles. When Friday is sent to collect a quarter million of them, he turns into a plastic water bottle menace!

programme.title: The Shape Shifter's Apprentice
programme.desc: The Shape Shifter returns with an apprentice in the form of a talking lizard whom she forces to help her steal the lamp. She disguises herself as Aladdins mum and tricks our heroes into leaving the lamp unattended, demanding that Genie make her the new ruler of Baghdad. But the lizard has grown rather fond of Jamillah and Aladdin and decides to help them rather than the Shape Shifter. When the Shape Shifter drags Genie into the town square they see an opportunity and the apprentice turns into an identical lamp to mislead her and lure her away so that they can steal Genie back.

programme.title: Salvar a Sandra
programme.desc: Una pareja lucha contra la industria farmacéutica para salvar a su hija diagnosticada con una rara enfermedad.

programme.title: Mi Boda Toscana
programme.desc: Los dueños de una lujosa villa en la Toscana reciben a parejas comprometidas para celebrar bodas de ensueño.

programme.title: Dama de Honor Enamorada
programme.desc: Después de que su novio la deja, una dama de honor se reencuentra con su antiguo amor... y todo cambia.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: Mahal Niqash
programme.desc: A live talk show exploring controversial topics and issues.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Political Indications
programme.desc: The programme breaks down the economic and political aspects of the week’s key events.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Fil Marma
programme.desc: A live sports programme providing intensive coverage of Saudi football news from all perspectives.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. programme.title: Its In Our Nature
programme.desc: A million wildlife species are facing the threat of extinction. But why does this matter to a tiny city state like Singapore? What do we stand to lose if our wildlife go extinct? Host Lam Shushan comes face to face with some of the rarest creatures in the world and meets the tenacious frontliners who are racing to save our native wildlife from extinction.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: Warning: do not watch Crave on an empty stomach. Because we’ll have you craving a creamy scoop of ice cream bedded on a crispy waffle. Or really, really needing to crunch into juicy fried chicken right now. Hosted by Charlotte Mei, the runner-up of Eat List Star, Crave finds out what gets celebrities salivating – roti prata, roast meats, sushi, satay, salted egg ice cream, buah keluak, and even an English-style big breakfast! Our celebrities’ cravings know no bounds, and anything from local to Japanese to Mediterranean fare is fair game – as long as they crave it. And there’s a little special by Charlotte. On every show, she will cook a dish – guaranteed to make you crave for it!

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Superman cartoons 6
programme.desc: Superman cartoons 6

programme.title: I Don't Scare 1956
programme.desc: Popeye has beaten Bluto to a date with Olive. Seeing that Olive is superstitious, Bluto changes the date to Friday the 13th, and proceeds to rig various proofs that bad things will happen if she goes out.

programme.title: Assault and Flattery 1956
programme.desc: Bluto is accusing Popeye in judge Wimpy's courtroom. Bluto tells a sad tale of how Popeye attacked him without provocation, but Popeye tells his side, in detail (in other words, a large chunk of _Balmy Swami, A (1949)_)

programme.title: Floor Flusher 1954
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto stop by to see Olive and fix her leaky faucet. Popeye does it better, and Bluto gets jealous, so he starts rerouting Olive's plumbing and causing all sorts of leaks. Popeye needs some help from the goldfish to get to his spinach

programme.title: The Song of the Birds-1935
programme.desc: The Song of the Birds-1935

programme.title: Jungle Drums- 1943
programme.desc: Superman vs. a secret Nazi outpost disguised as a jungle temple

programme.title: Robinhood Makes Good 1939
programme.desc: Three little squirrels act out the story of Robin Hood. A fox, thinking he can make a meal out of them, joins in. The squirrels have to find a way to get rid of the fox.

programme.title: Felix in the Bone Age-1922
programme.desc: Felix comes upon a caveman and his girlfriend. The girlfriend is crying, and when the caveman asks her what she wants, she points to Felix. The caveman chases Felix, who escapes by using the tails of some friendly monkeys to make his way down a steep cliff. Later he makes friends with a baby monkey, but winds up getting in a fight with a huge gorilla.

programme.title: Boom Boom-1936
programme.desc: World War I, apparently. There is a series of quick blackout gags, including a soldier that throws the pin, is blown sky-high by the grenade, and is caught in a net by an ambulance driver; one soldier's encounters with very smart bullets; a machine gunner with the jitters. Porky leads a charge, but with no support from his company, he runs back and dives under Beans' bunk. After a quick chorus of "You're in the Army Now," a messenger pigeon drops in with news that General Hardtack is being held prisoner. They dash off in a motorcycle/sidecar, chased by another smart bullet, and arrive in the nick of time to dispatch the general's captors. They fly off in a plane and get shot down to end up together in the hospital.

programme.title: Rocket Bye Baby 1956
programme.desc: A cosmic mix-up results in a Martian baby being delivered to Earth, while an Earth baby is sent to Mars. Joseph Wilbur and his wife try to raise the green-skinned, ingenious Martian tyke as if he were an Earthling. But the kid builds his own spaceship and flies away, and Wilbur must find him and bring him back, or he'll never be able to make an exchange with the Martian parents for his own boy.

programme.title: I'm in the Army Now 1936
programme.desc: To impress Olive, Bluto and Popeye try to convince an Army recruiter to sign him up.

programme.title: A Cartoonist's Nightmare 1935
programme.desc: A cartoonist falls victim to the very villains he has drawn. It's up to Beans the Cat to save the day.

programme.title: Plane Dumb-1932
programme.desc: After crash landing in Africa, Tom and Jerry masquerade as Africans in a futile attempt to adapt to a strange environment.

programme.title: The Gumby Show: Mysterious Fires 1957
programme.desc: A knight mistakes Gumby for a magician and asks for his help in fighting a set of mysterious fires around the kingdom.

programme.title: Noah's Ark 1959
programme.desc: Noah gets the word: build an ark in seven days. His sons cut the necessary trees in three days, and much furious sawing and hammering follows. But there's no rest, as they need to round up all the animals. Noah boards the animals, then his sons, their wives, and his wife (who packed a ferocious picnic). The rains and flood begin. The animals soon develop cabin fever and get restless, but Mrs. Noah has the answer: "Music has charms to soothe the savage beast." His sons find instruments and begin playing; everyone dances. But Harry the hippo dances with everyone but his wife; Noah goes to her, and while she tells him not to mention Harry's name, Noah convinces her that Harry is thinking only of her. The rains end; Noah sends a dove out who brings back an olive branch. They land on Mount Ararat and disembark.

programme.title: Bride and Gloom
programme.desc: Popeye is marrying Olive tomorrow; he's ecstatic. She has a dream of the future, including twin sons who prove to be a real handful. When Popeye comes by the next morning, he gets a frosty reception

programme.title: Little Nemo-1911
programme.desc: Little Nemo-1911

programme.title: The Candid Candidate- 1937
programme.desc: Betty Boop campaigns for Grampy for Mayor; he wins by one vote, but finds politics is no picnic. Urban renewal is parodied.

programme.title: The Paneless Window Washer 1937
programme.desc: On the outside of an office building, Popeye and Bluto duke it out as rival window washers.

programme.title: A Date to Skate 1938
programme.desc: Popeye takes Olive roller skating in a rink; she's never skated before, so he has to teach her, and she's not exactly a quick learner. After a while, she ends up outside the rink, and still out of control; she skates through a department store and causes major traffic problems. When she gets stuck on a speeding fire truck, Popeye realizes he'll need his spinach, but he's out fortunately, an audience member tosses him a can.

programme.title: Crowing Pains 1947
programme.desc: Foghorn convinces Henery that Sylvester is a chicken. Foghorn sticks Henery in an egg and sticks it under Sylvester.

programme.title: Molly Moo-Cow and The Butterflies -1935
programme.desc: Molly Moo-Cow and The Butterflies

programme.title: Pepe le-Pew - Heaven Scent 1956
programme.desc: On the French Riviera, a female cat is frightened by sudden outbursts of barking by every dog around her. So, to scare them away, she paints her back with a white stripe like that of a skunk. The dogs, on seeing her stripe, run away and hide in fright. But she doesn't receive the peace she'd expected, because Pepe Le Pew, the amorous French skunk, sees her, thinks she's a girl skunk, and tries to make love to her.

programme.title: A Haul in One 1956
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto are, believe it or not, pals and partners in a moving company. (Maybe it's because Popeye isn't squinting here.) Anyhow, Olive has made the mistake of hiring them. She hasn't finished packing yet, so the boys, smitten as soon as she answers the door, compete to help her. Once packed, they compete to move more impressive piles of her belongings. Popeye easily wins these contests, even though Bluto locks him in the van at one point. At the end, Bluto socks Popeye into the piano, then into a table; though he hardly seems to need it, Popeye still eats his spinach, then thrashes Bluto.

programme.title: Spree Lunch 1957
programme.desc: Popeye opens a diner; Bluto pulls one up right across the street. Wimpy comes along, and they compete for his business. The competition escalates, until finally they are throwing things at each other; Wimpy stands between them and snags a complete meal from the stream of objects passing overhead. Another spinach-free Popeye.

programme.title: Private eye popeye (1080)
programme.desc: Private Eye Popeye gets a call from Olive Oyl to guard a precious gem. But no sooner does he get the gem than the butler takes it (and Olive). The rest of the cartoon is spent chasing the crook to Paris, the Swiss Alps, and North Africa; Popeye always gets there first, but fails to make the arrest until he lucks into some spinach, of course

programme.title: The Friendly Ghost 1945
programme.desc: Depressed by the antics of the other ghosts, Casper leaves home to make friends. After unintentionally scaring several potential pals, Casper befriends two young children. They take him home, where Casper frightens their mother. Casper is again upset because he believes that he will always scare away his potential buddies. However, Casper scares away a banker who is coming to foreclose on the woman's house, and this wins her heart for Casper.

programme.title: Betty Boop- More Pep- 1936
programme.desc: In a return to the 'Out of the Inkwell' format, Betty Boop invents a 'pep' formula to speed up lazy Pudgy, but it escapes into the 'real world' with rapid results.

programme.title: In the Bag-1932
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry crash their plane in the cartoon wild, wild west. Surreal hi-jinx involving a vicious outlaw and robbery ensue.

programme.title: Felix in Fairyland-1923
programme.desc: Felix is reading a book about Fairyland, and decides that it must be a wonderful place to be. Suddenly he hears a cry for help, and finds a fly stuck on a piece of flypaper. He rescues the insect, only to have it turn into a beautiful fairy princess who, in gratitude for his help, grants him one wish. He wishes he were in Fairyland, and is immediately transported there.

programme.title: The Little Princess 1939
programme.desc: A little girl is left by her father in an exclusive seminary for girls, when her father fights in the Second Boer War. Later, when he is presumed dead she is forced to become a servant.

programme.title: Mabel's Married Life- 1914
programme.desc: Accosted by a masher in the park and unable to motivate husband Charlie into taking action, Mabel gets him a boxing mannequin to sharpen his fighting skills.

programme.title: The Rounders-1914
programme.desc: Two drunks live in the same hotel. One beats his wife, the other is beaten by his. They go off and get drunk together. They try to sleep in a restaurant using tables as beds and are thrown out. They lie down in a rowboat which fills with water, drowning them--a fate apparently better than going home to their wives.

programme.title: Mabel's Strange Predicament 1914
programme.desc: In a hotel lobby, an inebriated Charlie runs into an elegant lady, gets tied up in her dog's leash, and falls down. He later runs into her in the hotel corridor, locked out of her room. They run through various rooms. Mabel ends up in one, hiding under the bed of an elderly husband. Enter the jealous wife and Mabel's lover.

programme.title: Those Love Pangs -1914
programme.desc: Charlie and a rival vie for the favors of their landlady. In the park they each fall for different girls, though Charlie's has a male friend already. Charlie considers suicide, is talked out of it by a policeman, and later throws his girl's friend into the lake. Frightened, the girls go off to a movie. Charlie shows up there and flirts with them. Later both rivals substitute themselves for the girls and attack the unwitting Charlie. In an audience-wide fight, Charlie is tossed through the screen.

programme.title: Cops 1922
programme.desc: A series of mishaps manages to make a young man get chased by a big city's entire police force

programme.title: Back Stage-1919
programme.desc: Working their fingers to the bone to prepare the set for an upcoming performance, the enthusiastic stagehands, Roscoe and Buster, find themselves on stage when the cast quits. However, is will alone enough to earn a big round of applause?

programme.title: Mabel's Busy Day
programme.desc: A hotdog girl gives one to a policeman who then allows her into a race track. While other customers swipe her hotdogs, Charlie runs off with the whole box, pretending to sell them while actually giving them away. She calls her policeman who battles Charlie

programme.title: His Prehistoric Past-1914
programme.desc: Charlie dreams he is in the Stone Age, where King Low-Brow rules a harem of wives. Charlie, in skins and a bowler, falls in love with the king's favorite wife, Sum-Babee. During a hunting trip the king is pushed over a cliff. Charlie proclaims himself king, but Ku-Ku discovers the real king alive. They return to find Charlie and Sum-Babee together.

programme.title: You are watching the latest sports news from around the world!
Game previews, highlights and interviews from your favorite sport!
See what happened in the world of sports while you were sleeping!
The latest sports that you may have missed!
Spook Town 1944
programme.desc: Dty Gulch Trading Post owner Kurt Fabian advances money on mortgages to the local settlers to finance an irrigation program. Three Texas Rangers, Tex Wyatt, Jim Steele and Panhandle Perkins transport the money in a strong box which they place in the Wells Fargo safe as agent Sam Benson assures them that he is the only one who knows the safe combination. Fabian conspires with Bill Gunner, Breed Crocker and Trigger Booth to steal the money and they fail, but Fabian gets it on his own. Benson is arrested, and a committee of citizens, led by Oscar Perrin accuse Captain Wyatt and the Rangers of carelessness and request the resignation of the Captain if the money is not recovered. Fabian owns the abandoned ghost town of "Mystic", and Gunner, Crocker and Booth take him there to force him to tell where he has hidden the money, They shoot at his feet to intimidate him and he dies from fright and shock. Tex, Jim and Panhandle are also searching the town and they find Fabian's body. Benson tells Lucy Warren that the money may be hidden in the old Wells Fargo office in Mystic and they go there and find the strongbox. Enter Gunner, Crocker and Booth. Enter the Rangers. Gunfight

programme.title: Saddle Mountain Roundup 1942
programme.desc: An old man and his Chinese servant are in danger of becoming victims of the ruthless killer, "The Raven.

programme.title: Rough Riding Ranger_-1935
programme.desc: Hanson is using Bobby's carrier pigeons to receive messages. His man Slim shoots them down before they reach Bobby. When Slim is injured, Ranger Daniels, posing as a drunk, gets the job. He misses the next pigeon on purpose and gets the message from Bobby. But his identity has now become known and the gang rides to get him

programme.title: Rustlers' Hideout 1945
programme.desc: Bringing a herd of cattle to Dave Crockett, Billy halts before going through the pass where many herds have been rustled. He is right as there are two men after Crockett's ranch and packing plant which will be theirs if Crockett fails to pay off his note. When their attempt to get Crockett's son in financial trouble is broken up by Billy and their men fail to rustle the herd, they then poison the water hole

programme.title: Constantine and the Cross 1961
programme.desc: In Constantine and the Cross, the sweeping saga of Rome’s first Christian emperor comes to life. Cornel Wilde stars as Constantine, the warrior who rises from soldier to ruler while the empire is torn by conflict and faith. Guided by a vision of the cross, he embraces a new destiny, leading his legions into battle and laying the foundation for a transformed world. With epic battles, palace intrigue, and timeless themes of belief and power, this historical drama tells the inspiring story of a man who changed history forever.

programme.title: The Night Before Christmas 1968
programme.desc: In The Night Before Christmas, the timeless holiday poem springs to life in a colorful animated retelling. As children nestle in their beds on Christmas Eve, Saint Nicholas arrives with his sleigh full of toys, spreading joy and wonder with every step. With warm narration, festive music, and charming animation, this family favorite captures the magic and spirit of Clement Clarke Moore’s classic tale, making it a cherished Christmas tradition on screen.

programme.title: Candyland "The Bon Bon Parade" 1935
programme.desc: In The Bon Bon Parade, Walter Lantz delivers a sweet animated fantasy where candy comes to life in a whimsical parade of music and color. Chocolate soldiers march, peppermint sticks dance, and bonbons whirl in a dazzling display of imagination. With playful gags, lively animation, and a sugar-sprinkled sense of fun, this short film serves up a delightful treat for audiences young and old.

programme.title: Don't Open Til Christmas 1984
programme.desc: In Don’t Open Till Christmas, holiday cheer turns to terror on the streets of London when a masked killer begins targeting anyone dressed as Santa Claus. As the bodies pile up, a determined detective races against time to unmask the murderer before Christmas Eve becomes a nightmare. With grisly twists, chilling suspense, and a sinister holiday atmosphere, this cult slasher proves that not every gift under the tree brings joy.

programme.title: Pordioseros Y Ladrones
programme.desc: It seemed that Eduardo had it all, however, life turned its back on him after a betrayal that left him on the street. His godfather is a beggar who will confront the cartel that took absolutely everything from him.

programme.title: Reto Sangriento
programme.desc: A ghost hunting TV show begins to run into trouble as TV ratings start to drop. The owner of the television station forces the team to look for fresh content with realism at the cost of anything.

programme.title: They Call Her Headhunter
programme.desc: The wife of a nefarious TV Evangelist hires a savage bounty hunter known as the Headhunter to kidnap her husband and inflict terrible pain before killing him off. But things are not all what they seem in the world of ‘saving lives’ as the Headhunter discovers a very dark and wicked secret inside this cult.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: In this episode of "Behind the Blend," Sean Mobley interviews Rick Rodriguez, also known as "Chef Rick," from West Tampa Tobacco, who explains his nickname comes from blending tobacco like a chef uses food to create a desired flavor profile. Rick introduces new cigars like the "Circle of Life," a tribute to his mentors, and the "Double Crab," part of a Tampa-inspired trilogy, shaped like a "flying pig". He shares his personal journey into the cigar industry at age 40 and emphasizes that for him, cigars represent "connection" and a "gateway for a new friendship".

programme.title: Privada Cigar Club
programme.desc: Discover Mexican San Andres tobacco's rich history and unique flavors in this Privada Cigar Club documentary.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar connoisseur John Callery to review the Perdomo cigar. Together, they explore its well-rounded flavors, consistent burn, and overall smoking experience, sharing their expert opinions on what makes this cigar a standout choice for enthusiasts.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: Sean crosses the pond to sit down with Shaun Wilkinson, the driving force behind the British cigar brand, Rebellion. Shaun pulls back the curtain on the unique challenges and triumphs of establishing a premium cigar company in the UK, the inspiration behind Rebellion's distinctive blends, and their vision for the future of British cigars. Tune in for an engaging conversation that explores a fascinating corner of the global cigar landscape.

programme.title: Privada Cigar Club
programme.desc: Join us on a journey to the Dominican Republic as we honor the life and legacy of Joe Pito Kellner, a pioneer who significantly brought Davidoff cigars to the region.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: Join Dominic Depinto on a tour of Grand Cathedral Cigar Lounge in Tampa Florida. Learn the history and check out their walk in humidor, only on Unrolled.

programme.title: Creekside Cigar Co.
programme.desc: This Creekside Cigar Co podcast episode answers viewer questions and debunks cigar myths, such as the white ash signifying quality and the legend of cigars being rolled on virgins' thighs.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar expert Vikram Singh to review the iconic Don Pepin Garcia cigar. Together, they dive into its rich flavors, impeccable craftsmanship, and smooth burn, offering their insights on what makes this cigar a staple in the world of premium smokes.

programme.title: CITY TOUR TV - TULUM (MEXICO)
programme.desc: Explora la magia de Tulum con Leo Saleh en este episodio de City Tour TV.

programme.title: CITY TOUR TV ( VIAJE EN CRUCERO !! ) MSC CRUCEROS
programme.desc: En el programa de hoy te mostramos nuestro viaje en un exclusivo crucero junto a la empresa MSC , estuvimos presentes en la temporada inaugural de Grandiosa. El espectacular MSC Grandiosa, con capacidad para 6.300 huéspedes, 2.421 cabinas y 19 cubiertas, presume de un diseño moderno y sorprendente y de una gran cantidad de experiencias e instalaciones que llevarán su viaje al siguiente nivel.

programme.title: FASHION DISTRICT: ¿Dónde y cómo INVERTIR EN MIAMI 2025? Mejores zonas, oportunidades y tips para el Real Estate
SHE RESONATES: Brenda Carrasco
programme.desc:
Chicas Guapas TV presenta SHE RESONATES, un nuevo programa que amplifica las voces de mujeres en la industria de la música, destacando sus trayectorias, desafíos y logros.
En este primer episodio, Dakyta entrevista a Brenda Carrasco, vicepresidenta de marketing y estrategia artística en Warner Music Latina. Brenda comparte su inspirador camino desde México hasta Estados Unidos, los retos de ser inmigrante en la industria y cómo logró posicionarse en un rol de liderazgo dentro de una de las compañías discográficas más influyentes del mundo.
No te pierdas esta conversación llena de aprendizaje y motivación para todas aquellas que buscan dejar huella en la música.

programme.title: FULL MOON SESSIONS: Yami Safdie & Sarai
programme.desc: El atardecer en Miami se convierte en el escenario perfecto para una sesión acústica única en Full Moon Sessions. Yami Safdie emociona con una interpretación íntima de su hit En Otra Vida, seguida por Sarai, quien cautiva con su propio repertorio, creando una tarde llena de música y momentos especiales. Desde la terraza del W Hotel Brickell, la calidez del sunset y la energía de ambas artistas se combinan con una vista impresionante de la ciudad.

programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: IVANNA ICARDI HABLA DE COSAS INESPERADAS
programme.desc:
Ivanna Icardi es reconocida por su amplia trayectoria en televisión, específicamente en el mundo de los realities, donde ha participado en varios incluyendo algunos de Argentina, España e Italia. Además de ser la hermana del futbolista Mauro Icardi, en este episodio hablamos sobre su carrera, su familia y sobretodo también su futuro laboral: Ivana se ha lanzado como cantante solista!
Este programa fusiona dos mundos irresistibles: el periodismo de actualidad y la auténtica gastronomía italiana. Junto a Sol Macaluso, periodista internacional con una comunidad activa y fiel, y su pareja, Gennaro Arrichiello, pizzaiolo napolitano, ofrecerán un contenido diferente, donde cada episodio traerá conversaciones divertidas con invitados famosos e influyentes. Episodios nuevos cada Jueves por todas las plataformas. @pizzaymate.podcast

programme.title: FULL MOON SESSIONS: Stef Iracet & Zeta Bosio
programme.desc: La luna llena ilumina Miami y el rooftop del W Hotel Brickell se convierte en el escenario perfecto para una sesión única de música electrónica. Disfruta del set especial de Stef Iracet y Zeta Bosio, donde el legendario bajista de Soda Stereo se une a la talentosa DJ argentina para una noche mágica en Full Moon Sessions, el nuevo programa de Chicas Guapas TV. Dejate llevar por los beats, la energía del público y las impresionantes vistas de la ciudad mientras celebramos la música en un ambiente exclusivo.

programme.title: Guest Day26
programme.desc: Day26 is a band that Diddy formed and nurtured so you know they’ve been through it. They succeeded, broke up, reunited, and now they’re independent. They got stories.

programme.title: Guest Rev. Dr. Al Sharpton
programme.desc: National Action Network founder Rev. Dr. Al Sharpton talks about his MLK Day rally in Washington, DC and a boycott of anti DEI corporations.

programme.title: Dating Mistakes, Sick Kids
programme.desc:
Dating in 2025 can be WILD! This week on the Nessa Off Air Podcast, Nessa and Katrina B are sharing dating stories. Now, even though these two aren’t out in the dating world anymore, their hair and makeup artists Marci and Lino are! And they…have…stories… and Nessa and Katrina B are here to tell them all! This opens up a much bigger conversation about DATING ETIQUETTE in 2025. This is a really fun and interesting conversation and we’re sure there are a lot of opinions out there about this and we want to know what you think!
Next, these two have an important PSA to ALL PARENTS out there: KEEP YOUR SICK KIDS AT HOME!!! Tune into this week’s episode to find out how we got onto this topic and how it matters!

programme.title: Guest Shaun T
programme.desc: Shaun T is an amazing fitness trainer — the man behind Insanity — and he’s had a fascinating life. He goes deep into how he was sexually abused throughout his youth and how he’s become an inspiration to others and what you really should be doing to get the best workout you can.

programme.title: Guest Sheila Eldridge
programme.desc: Entrepreneur and broadcast luminary Sheila Eldridge on The HBCU First Look Film Festival, the amplification of Black voices & creators, and more.

programme.title: Guest Babyface
programme.desc: Babyface is a legend. Songwriter, producer, singer — he’s made lots of the greatest songs of the past few decades. We talk about music — how this obsession started, how he makes it, and a deep look into some of the songs he’s made.

programme.title: Garlic "Butter" Mushrooms OMG!
programme.desc: This mouth-watering dish is 100% dairy-free and yet SO buttery!

programme.title: There Was A Killing
programme.desc: Regan Russell’s tragic death exposes the dark side of animal agriculture in this gripping film.

programme.title: At Home with The Jenners - Planting Roots
programme.desc: From garden to gourmet, join Cayley & Brandon Jenner as they unleash flavors of plant-based cooking.

programme.title: Meet the Chickens -Short Film
programme.desc: This short and uplifting film will change everything you thought you knew about chickens!

programme.desc: Spork Food's sisters make their Fresh Spring Rolls with Glazed Shiitake Mushrooms and Tangy Peanut Dipping Sauce! Yoga master, Andrew Sealy, cooks delicious Pancakes with a homemade Blueberry Syrup

programme.title: Redfoo's Party Farmhouse- Short film
programme.desc: Enter the California kitchen of LMFAO's Redfoo & his partner Jazzy! Watch them create magical food!

programme.title: The Wicked Kitchen-3 Mind Bending Mushrooms to Cook With
programme.desc: Three amazing mushrooms and the techniques used to cook them.

programme.title: New Day New Chef - Superfood Pizza & Deviled "Eggs"

programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.title: The Mermaid's Curse
programme.desc: A young man falls in love with a seductive, sultry, young woman he meets on the beach. The more he falls for her, the more he will learn the dangers of falling in love with a siren...

programme.title: Ditch Day
programme.desc: Jenny Bilson, a high school senior, is the perfect student, a wonderful daughter to a veteran police detective and an all American Dream. But the one mistake she is unaware of making is about to haunt her in a very violent way, as her past returns for revenge...

programme.title: American Beast (aka Beast of Prey)
programme.desc: After finding an old storage locker filled with his family's history, James Erikson begins a journey to discover the truth behind a mysterious piece of land in the small town of Solitude...

programme.title: Die In One Day
programme.desc: After a failed marriage, Richard is in search of his daughter Mindy. He meets Sasha, an aspiring actress who promises to help him. But the hope to get some quick cash by performing in a 24 hours play soon turns out to be a bloody game...

programme.title: El Mal Interior
programme.desc: Un chico solitario y mentalmente discapacitado se hace amigo de su reflejo en un espejo antiguo. Esta criatura demoníaca le ordena que se lance a una matanza asesina de las personas que más quiere...

programme.title: Ana
programme.desc: Dos hombres roban una muñeca de un museo que, sin saberlo, abre una puerta al Infierno...

programme.title: Alfredo
programme.desc: Brendan Cobbs, un famoso novelista, es enviado a una remota cabaña de la Inglaterra rural en busca de inspiración para su próxima novela. Cree haber encontrado su próximo tema cuando se encuentra con Alfred, un muñeco del tamaño de un niño que puede cobrar vida. Pero surgen consecuencias mortales cuando Brendan se da cuenta de que Alfred tiene intención de matar.

programme.title: Apuesta con la Muerte 2
programme.desc: Tras la captura de Carrillo y de su padre, Rogelio y Emilio asumen el mando del cartel. Ahora Carrillo recobró su libertad y quiere retomar el control. En busca del poder absoluto, se desatará una guerra sin cuartel que no respetará ningún límite.

programme.title: De Apellido Pesado
programme.desc: De Misión Texas son las hermanas Carrillo, heredaron el apellido que defenderán a toda costa. El Narcotráfico es el negocio de la familia que se expande a nuevos territorios, los carteles opuestos le piensan poner un alto a las Carrillo pero se tienen que atener a las consecuencias porque ellas son De Apellido pesado,

programme.title: Anabel
programme.desc: Tras la marcha, en circunstancias algo turbias, de Anabel, sus dos compañeras de piso deben buscar a alguien más con quien compartir el alquiler. El elegido es un señor mayor que logra ganarse su confianza, pero que pronto se descubrirá como una presencia extraña e inquietante.

programme.title: Amar
programme.desc: Carlos quiere pero Susana no. Joel no quiere pero Patricia lo obliga. Gabriel lo espera pero Martha no se lo da. Amado lo busca con una gringa y lo pierde. Benito lo tiene toda la vida. Concha se lo lleva más allá del sistema solar. Todos lo quieren y todos lo dan pero unos no lo reciben y otros quieren más. Así es Amar.

programme.title: Allá y Entonces
programme.desc: Narra el encuentro de Temístocles con su padrino, a quien cree haber matado y ahora supone un fantasma que viene a desquiciarlo. Pasando del drama a la comedia y enredos absurdos, Temístocles enfrenta sus fantasmas hasta perder el control de su vida y llevar su economía a la bancarrota. Su esposa va a dar a luz. Al descubrir que su padrino vive, se abre la posibilidad de saldar su deuda y romper con el maleficio.

programme.title: A Ellas Les Gustan Mayores
programme.desc: Ricardo Soto está casado con Miranda Robles, una mujer guapa con una afortunada posición social. Su esposo aprovechará esta situación para ponerle el cuerno con una jovencita mucho menor que él, sin recordar que el que ríe al último, ríe mejor

programme.title: El Cóndor En Nueva York
programme.desc: Un narcotraficante de Nueva York, llamado Damián, ha creado una nueva droga con efectos impactantes. Después de varias muertes accidentales, la DEA y la policía se embarcan en una búsqueda inútil en busca de este jefe de la mafia. Damián comienza a derrotar a su competencia con la ayuda de su científico privado y un informante de la DEA. El hijo del alcalde Martínez (de Súper Cóndor) queda en coma tras consumir el nuevo medicamento. El alcalde Martínez vuela a Nueva York desde Perú para comenzar su propia investigación en busca de Damián y una cura. Todo parece sombrío para los agentes de la DEA, el alcalde Martínez y su hijo; hasta que llegue la ayuda. El Cóndor llega a Nueva York desde Perú para ayudar a revertir los efectos de esta nueva y brutal droga y llevar a Damián ante la justicia.

programme.title: Amateur
programme.desc: Martín, es un editor que trabaja en un canal de televisión cuyo dueño es el señor Battaglia. Martín se está separando y no tiene donde dormir, por lo que este hombre le ofrece quedarse en uno de sus departamentos en el centro de la cuidad. A la vez a este joven le encomiendan ir al archivo del canal a encontrar una película, pero en dicho lugar todo está desordenado y sin catalogar. A partir de esto, se lleva muchos videos a su nuevo hogar para revisarlos, y entre ellos encuentra uno de tinte erótico que protagoniza una mujer, que luego le será presentada como su vecina Isabel, y esposa de Battaglia. Martín no puede sacarse la imagen de su mente.

programme.title: Catemaco: Magia y Misterio
programme.desc: Una familia normal va de vacaciones a Catemaco, Michoacan un pueblo famoso y pintoresco en Mexico. Todo marcha bien hasta que son atacados por criminales, el padre sobrevive, y con ayuda del brujo mayor del pueblo cobra venganza.

programme.title: "Not Now" Is Not "No"

programme.title: It's The Motion That Matters
programme.desc: When you’re in transition and lacking information, fear can creep in. In those times, you need to remember that faith isn’t a feeling, it’s a behavior. And sometimes, in order to move forward, you need to learn to step out in doubt.

programme.title: He Was The One
programme.desc: Assume that God is using you. In “He Was The One,” Pastor Steven teaches us that instead of judging our current season, we should trust that it is significant to where God is taking us next.
